Conservation - Protecting endangered species and educating visitors about the importance of wildlife conservation.
Disease Transmission - Preventing the spread of diseases within the animal population and among visitors.
Enrichment - Providing animals with engaging and stimulating activities to prevent boredom and stress-related issues.
Safety - Ensuring the safety of visitors, zoo staff, and animals through proper safety measures and guidelines.
Financial Sustainability - Balancing the costs of maintaining the zoo, animal care, staff, and educational programs.
